quote: There is nothing more deceptive than an obvious fact.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle, Sherlock Holmes

quote: When you have eliminated all which is impossible, then whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle, Sherlock Holmes

quote: The meaning of life is to give life meaning.
author: Viktor Emil Frankl

quote: It is not our abilities that show what we truly areâ€¦ it is our choices.
author: J.K. Rowling, Albus Dumbledore

quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: J.K. Rowling, Albus Dumbledore

quote:
Love is a Polaroid...

 Better in picture, but never can fill the void.
author: Imagine Dragons, from Polaroid

quote: In case I don't see ya, good afternoon, good evening, and goodnight.
author: Jim Carrey, The Truman Show

quote:
Hell, as you call it, has always been the true heart of human religion.

You can curb the worst of your savageries only through collective fear and hatred of another world.
author: White Rabbit, Devil May Cry
